name: pino-devtools
description: A transport for viewing the logs in your favorite browser devtools

scripts.build: rimraf dist/ && babel src/ --env server -d dist/src/ --ignore src/client.js --copy-files && babel index.js --env server -d dist/ && babel --env client src/client.js -d dist/ && cp -r LICENSE.txt README.md package.json docs/ dist/

author: Mozilla Add-ons Team
